title: Blockscout errored on getBlockByNumber API when block has transcations

body:
for ref

https://www.quicknode.com/docs/ethereum/eth_getBlockByNumber

looks correct, how does ganache differ for `eth_getBlockByNumber`?

Hmm it looks like in the transaction in https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry/issues/2888#issue-1346885903, they are missing the "to" field. Since they are contract creation txs, should they return the new contract address?

```
>>> k = ''
>>> with open('asdf','r') as f:
...    k = json.loads(f.read())
...
>>> 'to' in k['result']['transactions'][0].keys()
False
```

the 'asdf' file is the pasted in json from the resp in https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry/issues/2888#issuecomment-1222923473

The reason that's relevant is because IIUC on the erlang side the functions map to the data received. It's complaining it can't find a function that processes the transaction json data when `to` is null

> Since they are contract creation txs, should they return the new contract address?

`to` is null if CREATE tx

Oh got it, I curled an infura rpc node and got this json for the tx (a contract creation tx), which includes "to" but sets it to null.
```
{u'nonce': u'0x284', u'chainId': u'0x1', u'from': u'0xf296178d553c8ec21a2fbd2c5dda8ca9ac905a00', u'blockHash': u'0xa4a8608f026f8e99dbb22aa4191b91f2f2b4f0b177165179d3cc4b56dc24c52f', u'type': u'0x2', u'v': u'0x1', u'gas': u'0x78ad30', u'value': u'0x0', u'blockNumber': u'0xc8068d', u'accessList': [], u'to': None, ....
```

Is the rust json encoder maybe omitting null values?

> > Since they are contract creation txs, should they return the new contract address?
> 
> `to` is null if CREATE tx

Sorry I think I mistyped in https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry/issues/2888#issuecomment-1223027535, `to` is entirely missing in the json which I think is causing the issue. I think it's expected that its value is `null`, but my guess is the rust json encode omits null values?

right, they're ignored if null rn
will check when/why this was added and if safe to emit null

just not bumped yet

change is included here #2938
